cmput301.f13t01.model

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.model.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Media<android.text.SpannableString>, java.io.Serializable

    public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements Media<android.text.SpannableString>, java.io.Serializable
    Class for Text type Media. Uses a SpannableString which represents the Text content.
    Author:
    Jesse Huard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
